Japan: Twenty-six Martyrs of Japan were crucified in Nagasaki in the aftermath of the San Felipe incident.
Indonesia: de Houtman’s expedition returns to the Netherlands with enough spices to make a considerable profit.
Cuba: Construction of the Morro Castle fortress is completed above the eastern entrance to Havana harbor.
China: Siege of Ulsan: A combined Ming-Joseon force arrived at the Japanese-controlled Ulsan Japanese Castle.
Cambodia: Spanish adventurers install a son of King Sattha on the throne.
Burma: All regions of the kingdom now in revolt
Bangladesh: Man Singh sends forces against Isa Khan but they are defeated in a naval battle near Vikrampur.
